item.title: 小米中国区市场部总经理王腾因泄密被辞退
item.guid: 小米中国区市场部总经理王腾因泄密被辞退
item.description:
Last night, Phoenix Network Technology revealed that Xiaomi issued an internal announcement: 昨晚，凤凰网科技爆出，小米发布内部公告：

Wang Teng, an employee of the China Region Marketing Department, leaked confidential company information and engaged in serious violations of discipline, including conflicts of interest. In accordance with the "Xiaomi Group Employee Violation Handling Measures," "Xiaomi Group Integrity and Anti-Corruption Code," and other regulations, the company decided to dismiss Wang Teng.

It is reported that Wang Teng was promoted to General Manager of Xiaomi China Region Marketing Department and concurrently served as General Manager of REDMI brand at the end of December 2024. His rank was 21, making him a middle-level management cadre. Wang Teng was previously known within the company and in the public eye for being "bold in speech and quick to retort," and was even jokingly called "Emperor Wang Teng" by netizens. 据悉， 王腾于 2024 年 12 月底升任为小米中国区市场部总经理，并兼任 REDMI 品牌总经理，其职级为 21 级，为中层管理干部。王腾此前在公司内部和公众视野中一直以「敢说敢怼」著称，更是被网友戏称「王腾大帝」。

After the "leak" news broke, Wang Teng personally responded in a post: 「泄密」消息爆出后，王腾亲自发文回应：

I am very ashamed to apologize to everyone. I made some mistakes in the past and accept the consequences.

In his post, he expressed gratitude to Mr. Lei and all company leaders for their many years of nurturing and trust, stating he was very reluctant to leave. "In the future, I will continue to support Xiaomi and REDMI as always." He also added, "I will rest for a while before starting anew." 其在文中表示，感谢雷总和公司各位领导过去多年的培养和信任，非常不舍离开。 「未来仍然会一如既往的支持小米，支持 REDMI。」其还称，「先休息一段时候再重新开始。」

Currently, Wang Teng's verification information on platforms like Weibo and Douyin has been canceled. According to multiple reports, Wang Teng had previously been named for "leaking secrets" multiple times in Xiaomi's promotional videos. Last August, Xiaomi founder Lei Jun mentioned in a live broadcast: "Aside from our General Manager Teng (Wang Teng) frequently leaking secrets and getting fined, my reputation is still quite good." 目前，王腾的微博、抖音等平台已经取消了认证信息。另据多方报道， 王腾此前多次在小米的宣传视频中被点名「泄密」。 去年 8 月，小米创办人雷军曾在直播中提到： 「除了我们滕总（王腾）动不动泄密被罚款以外，我的口碑还是可以的。」

Additionally, digital leaker 'Digital Chat Station' has been repeatedly 'questioned' by netizens about whether the operator of the account is Wang Teng himself. Last night, 'Digital Chat Station' posted a response stating, 'This incident has nothing to do with me, and I will update as usual.' 另外，数码爆料博主「数码闲聊站」曾被网友多次「质疑」账号下运营者是王腾本人。昨晚，「数码闲聊站」发文回应表示「本次事件与我无关，会正常更新。」

item.title: iPhone 17 系列国行电池容量小于美版
item.guid: iPhone-17-系列国行电池容量小于美版
item.description:
According to Kuaikeji news, the battery information for the iPhone 17 series, which will be released early tomorrow morning, has been exposed. The capacity of the Chinese version will be reduced compared to the US version: 据快科技消息，即将在明天凌晨发布的 iPhone 17 系列电池信息曝光，而国行版容量将比美版有所缩减：

    The Chinese version of iPhone 17 Pro Max has a battery capacity of 4823mAh, while the US version reaches 5088mAh, and the new phone's battery life is expected to increase from 33 hours to over 35 hours;

    The Chinese version of iPhone 17 Pro is 3988mAh, and the US version is 4252mAh;

    iPhone 17 Air has a capacity of 3149mAh.

It's worth noting that the inconsistency in battery capacity between the Chinese and US versions of the iPhone is due to the latter adopting eSIM technology, which eliminates the need for a physical SIM card slot, thus saving internal space that can be used for a larger battery. 值得一提的是，iPhone 国行与美版的电池容量不一致是因后者采用了 eSIM 技术，无需实体卡槽，从而节省内部空间可用于增大电池。

According to internal images of the iPhone 17 Pro previously exposed by blogger Majinbu, the Chinese version's battery has an irregular side and is shorter compared to the US version's battery. Therefore, in terms of battery capacity, the Chinese version may be smaller than the US version. Majinbu also explained that the reduced battery space in the Chinese version is to accommodate the SIM card slot. 据此前博主 Majinbu 曝光的 iPhone 17 Pro 内部图片显示，国行版电池异形侧，相较于美版电池要更加短，因此电池容量方面，国行版或会小于美版。Majinbu 也解释称，国行版减少的电池位置是为了放下 SIM 卡槽。

item.title: 宇树科技否认 IPO 估值 500 亿
item.guid: 宇树科技否认-IPO-估值-500-亿
item.description:
According to news from 'Science and Technology Innovation Board Daily', regarding reports that Unitree Robotics is eyeing an IPO valuation of 7 billion US dollars (approximately 49.9 billion RMB), Unitree Robotics responded through the report: 据《科创板日报》消息，针对有消息称宇树科技着眼于 70 亿美元（约 499 亿人民币）的 IPO 估值的消息，宇树科技回应通过报道回应：

Currently, there has been no discussion about IPO valuation inside or outside the company, and the related valuation information is untrue.

It is reported that Unitree Robotics revealed in a post this month that it expects to submit its listing application documents to the stock exchange between October and December 2025, at which time the company's relevant operational data will be officially disclosed. 据悉， 宇树科技在本月曾发文透露，其预计将在 2025 年 10 月至 12 月期间向证券交易所提交上市申请文件，届时公司的相关运营数据将正式披露。

Unitree stated that, taking 2024 as an example, sales of its quadruped robots, humanoid robots, and component products accounted for approximately 65%, 30%, and 5% respectively. Among these, about 80% of quadruped robots are used in research, education, and consumer fields; 20% are used in industrial fields, such as inspection and firefighting; humanoid robots are entirely used in research, education, and consumer fields. 宇树方面表示，以 2024 年为例，旗下四足机器人、人形机器人和组件产品的销售额分别占约 65%、30% 和 5%。其中，约 80% 的四足机器人被应用于研究、教育和消费领域；20% 则被用于工业领域，如检查与消防；人形机器人完全用于研究、教育和消费领域。

In July this year, according to the official website of the China Securities Regulatory Commission, Hangzhou Unitree Robotics Co., Ltd. ('Unitree Robotics') began its IPO coaching, with CITIC Securities as the coaching institution. This indicates that Unitree Robotics has officially launched its IPO. 今年 7 月，据中国证监会官网显示，杭州宇树科技股份有限公司（「宇树科技」）开启上市辅导，辅导机构为中信证券。这表明，宇树科技正式启动 IPO。

According to 'ChinaVenture' news, as per the plan, IPO coaching will last at least three months. In response, Unitree will participate in coaching exams in September-October this year and undergo a comprehensive listing assessment in October-December. The report analyzes that Unitree's official listing on the STAR Market 'will be next year'. 而据「投中网」消息，按照规划，IPO 辅导至少三个月。对此，宇树将在今年 9-10 月参与辅导考试，10-12 月进行上市综合评估。对此，报道分析称宇树正式登陆科创板「得到明年了」。

item.title: 美团 CEO 王兴：高频骑手平均收入可超万元
item.guid: 美团-CEO-王兴：高频骑手平均收入可超万元
item.description:
Recently, according to news from E-commerce Pie and Phoenix News, Meituan CEO Wang Xing sent an internal letter to employees. In the letter, Wang Xing mentioned that over the past year, Meituan served 770 million users, 14.5 million annual active merchants, connected an average of 3.36 million riders per month, and instant retail daily order peaks exceeded 150 million orders. 日前，据电商派及凤凰新闻消息，美团 CEO 王兴向员工发布内部信。信中，王兴提到，过去一年，美团服务了 7.7 亿用户、1450 万年活跃商户，月均连接了 336 万骑手，即时零售日订单峰值突破了 1.5 亿单。

According to Wang Xing, in the first quarter of 2025, the average income of Meituan's high-frequency riders will be 7230-10100 yuan, an increase of 12% compared to the end of 2024. At the same time, Meituan's pension insurance subsidy for riders will be rolled out nationwide this year, covering all types of riders. 据王兴透露， 2025 年一季度，美团高频骑手平均收入 7230-10100 元，比 24 年末增长了12%。 同时，美团骑手养老保险补贴今年将推至全国，覆盖全部类型骑手。

Wang Xing stated in the letter, 'We are committed to making 'food delivery' a profession with stable income, comprehensive protection, and a future, fully leveraging its social value in 'stabilizing employment'.' 王兴在信中表示， 「我们致力于让‘送外卖’成为收入稳、保障全、有未来的职业，充分发挥‘稳就业’的社会价值。」

Wang Xing also stated that Meituan insists on investing in merchant ecosystem construction to drive healthy industry development. 'When small and medium-sized merchants face subsidy competition pressure, we provide up to 50,000 yuan in assistance funds to stabilize their operations. By the end of the year, Meituan's assistance funds will cover over 400,000 small stores.' 王兴还表示，美团坚持商家生态建设投入，带动行业健康发展。「中小商家面临补贴竞争压力时，我们提供了最高 5 万元助力金以稳定经营。年底，美团助力金将覆盖超过 40 万家小店。」

Regarding AI: A blind massage parlor in Shanghai recently 'hired' 4 Meituan 'AI employees' to use voice interaction to assist staff as customer service assistants and analyze data; at the same time, more merchants used Meituan's AI programming tool 'NoCode' to generate official websites and other applications. AI 方面：上海一家盲人按摩店近期「雇佣」了 4 位美团「AI 员工用」语音交互帮店员做客服助手、分析数据；同时更多商家用美团的 AI 编程工具「NoCode」生成了官网等应用。

item.title: AI 教父：前女友曾用 ChatGPT 与自己分手
item.guid: AI-教父：前女友曾用-ChatGPT-与自己分手
item.description:
Recently, 77-year-old 'Godfather of AI' Geoffrey Hinton mentioned in an interview with the Financial Times that he was dumped by his ex-girlfriend, and the reason for the breakup was written by ChatGPT. 近日，77 岁的 AI 教父 Geoffrey Hinton 在接受《金融时报》采访时提到， 自己被前女友甩了，而分手理由却是 ChatGPT 写的。

It is reported that Hinton's ex-girlfriend, wanting to break up, asked AI to write a short essay titled 'Why Hinton is a Scumbag'. She directly input her dissatisfaction with Hinton into ChatGPT, had the AI analyze Hinton's behavior, and then sent the generated content to him. The AI even called him a 'rat' in it. 据悉，Hinton 的前女友因想分手，便让 AI 写了一篇《Hinton 为什么是个渣男》的小作文，直接把对 Hinton 的不满输入 ChatGPT，让 AI 分析了一遍 Hinton 的行为，最后把生成的内容发给了他。AI 甚至在里面说他是个「卑鄙小人」（rat）。

Hinton's reaction, however, was quite calm: 'I don't think I'm that bad, so I wasn't too affected. And I've already met someone I like more.' 而 Hinton 的反应倒是很淡定：「我不觉得自己那么糟糕，所以没太受影响。而且我已经遇到了更喜欢的人。」

It is reported that Hinton has experienced many twists and turns in his romantic life: 据悉，Hinton 感情路上经历了不少波折：

    In his early years, he met and married his first wife, Joanne, while pursuing his postdoctoral studies, and they had children after marriage. Later, the two separated amicably but continued to maintain a friendly relationship.

    Hinton later married molecular biologist Ros, and they settled in Toronto, adopting two children from Latin America. It was originally a warm academic family, but in 1994, Ros suddenly died of ovarian cancer. Hinton became a single father overnight, raising two young children alone.

    In 1997, Hinton met and remarried British art historian Jackie Ford, but fate played another cruel trick. Jackie was diagnosed with pancreatic cancer a few years ago and passed away in April 2023 at the age of 59.

🔗 Related reading: AI Godfather dumped by ex-girlfriend using AI, ChatGPT short essay: Scumbag 🔗 相关阅读：AI 教父被前女友用 AI 甩了，ChatGPT 小作文：渣男

item.title: 特斯拉 AI 开通微博账号
item.guid: 特斯拉-AI-开通微博账号
item.description:
Recently, Tesla launched its 'TeslaAI' account on Weibo. 近期，特斯拉在微博开通了其「TeslaAI」账号。

The profile shows that the account will publish Tesla AI technologies such as Tesla humanoid robots, intelligent assisted driving, Robotaxi autonomous ride-hailing, and Cortex computing clusters. 个人简介显示，该账号将公布特斯拉人形机器人、智能辅助驾驶、Robotaxi 无人驾驶网约车、Cortex 计算集群等特斯拉 AI 技术。

On September 7, TeslaAI posted its first Weibo update with the caption 'I have been working hard to improve my physique,' accompanied by an image of the golden Tesla humanoid robot Optimus. 9 月 7 日，TeslaAI 发布了其首条微博，配文「我一直在努力改善自己的身材」，而配图则为金色的特斯拉人形机器人 Optimus。

It is worth noting that the Optimus in the picture is similar to the previously exposed Optimus with 'human-like' mechanical hands. Many parties speculate that this might be Optimus 3. The hands of the Optimus released by TeslaAI this time are black, not the previous golden color. 值得一提的是，图片中的 Optimus 与此前曝光的、拥有「类人」机械手的 Optimus 相似，对此多方推测，这或为 Optimus 3。本次 TeslaAI 发布的 Optimus 手部为黑色，并非此前的金色。

Last week, Salesforce CEO Marc Benioff posted a video about Tesla's Optimus humanoid robot, demonstrating Optimus's voice communication and mobility. 上周，Salesforce CEO Marc Benioff 发布了一条关于特斯拉 Optimus 人形机器人的视频，展示了 Optimus 的语音交流以及活动能力。

From the video released by Marc, the hands of the Optimus he revealed are very eye-catching: the hand details are highly similar to human hands, even possessing details like fingernails. However, many netizens and media have also analyzed that these hands might just be a 'prop.' 从 Marc 公布的视频来看，其公布的 Optimus 的双手十分吸引眼球：手部细节与人类双手高度相似，甚至拥有指甲盖等细节。但也有不少网友和媒体分析，该双手可能只是个「摆设」。

On September 7, Musk responded, stating that the robot mentioned above is not Optimus 3, but Optimus 2.5. 9 月 7 日当天， 马斯克发文回应，上述机器人并非 Optimus 3，而是 Optimus 2.5。

item.title: 高通骁龙峰会中国场定档 9 月底
item.guid: 高通骁龙峰会中国场定档-9-月底
item.description:
Recently, Qualcomm officially announced that it will hold the Snapdragon Summit China event in Beijing from September 24-25. 日前，高通正式宣布将于 9 月 24 日- 25 日在北京举行骁龙峰会中国场。

The official statement indicates that 2025 marks Qualcomm's 40th anniversary and its 30th year of development in China. Relying on collaborative innovation in 'AI + Connectivity,' Qualcomm is working with Chinese partners to accelerate the large-scale application of cutting-edge technologies. 官方表示，2025 年是高通公司成立 40 周年，也是在中国发展的第 30 年。依托「AI + 连接」协同创新，高通正携手中国合作伙伴加速推动前沿技术的规模化应用。

At this summit, the brand-new Snapdragon annual flagship platform will be officially released. According to previous reports, the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen5 processor is expected to be unveiled this time. 本次峰会，全新骁龙年度旗舰平台将正式发布。而据此前消息，本次有望发布骁龙 8 Elite Gen5 处理器。

According to previous news from blogger 'Digital Chat Station,' the SM8850 (Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen5) chip currently has a main frequency of 4.61GHz, featuring 2 ultra-large cores at 4.61GHz and 6 large cores at 3.63GHz, utilizing an Adreno 840 GPU with a frequency of 1.2GHz±. 据此前博主「数码闲聊站」消息，SM8850（骁龙 8 Elite Gen5）现阶段芯片主频为 4.61GHz，拥有 2 颗 4.61GHz 超大核以及 6 颗 3.63GHz 大核，采用 Adreno 840 GPU，频率为 1.2GHz±。

item.title: 华为高管：一款好的辅助驾驶汽车保费更低
item.guid: 华为高管：一款好的辅助驾驶汽车保费更低
item.description:
According to Yicai Global, at yesterday's Deepal Auto global new product launch event, Jin Yuzhi, CEO of Huawei Intelligent Automotive Solution BU, said: 据第一财经消息，在昨天的深蓝汽车全球新品发布会上，华为智能汽车解决方案 BU CEO 靳玉志说：

When buying a new energy vehicle, everyone should pay special attention to assisted driving, because a good assisted driving car can reduce accident rates, lower insurance premiums, and have a higher resale value.

At this launch event, Deepal Auto officially released two new models, the Deepal S07 and S09, which are equipped with Huawei Qiankun ADS SE and ADS 4 intelligent assisted driving systems, respectively. 而在本次发布会上，深蓝汽车正式发布了全新深蓝 S07 和 S09 两款车型，分别搭载了华为乾崑 ADS SE 和 ADS 4 两款智能辅助驾驶系统。

item.title: Google 公布 Gemini 具体使用限制
item.guid: Google-公布-Gemini-具体使用限制
item.description:
Recently, Google officially announced the specific usage restrictions for Gemini: 日前，Google 正式公布了 Gemini 的具体使用限制：

    Free users: Can use a maximum of 5 Gemini 2.5 Pro prompts per day, with a context window size of 32,000; DeepResearch can generate a maximum of 5 reports per month using 2.5 Flash; image generation and editing are limited to a maximum of 100 images per day.

    Google AI Pro: 2.5 Pro prompts increased to 100, context window of 1 million (consistent with AI Ultra); DeepResearch can generate a maximum of 20 reports per month using 2.5 Flash; image generation and editing are limited to a maximum of 1000 images per day (consistent with AI Ultra). Additionally, it can generate a maximum of 3 videos per day using Veo 3 Fast (preview version).

    Google AI Ultra: 2.5 Pro prompts increased to 500; DeepResearch can generate a maximum of 200 reports per month using 2.5 Flash; Deep Think is limited to a maximum of 10 prompts per day, with a context window capable of accommodating 192,000 tokens; a maximum of 5 videos can be generated per day using Veo 3 Fast (preview version).

item.title: Android 经典第三方桌面 Nova Launcher 将停止维护
item.guid: Android-经典第三方桌面-Nova-Launcher-将停止维护
item.description:
According to Android Authority, Nova Launcher, a third-party desktop launcher once beloved by power users, is about to permanently cease service. Simultaneously, founder Kevin Barry has left Nova's parent company, Branch, and will no longer be involved in subsequent projects. 据 Android Authority 报道，曾备受玩机用户喜爱的第三方桌面启动器 Nova Launcher 即将永久停止服务，同时，创始人 Kevin Barry 也已离开 Nova 母公司 Branch，并不再参与后续项目。

It is reported that Nova Launcher was developed by Kevin Barry's team and acquired by Branch in 2022. At the time, Branch promised not to turn Nova Launcher into a subscription-based, ad-supported ordinary Android desktop launcher. 据悉，Nova Launcher 由 Kevin Barry 带队开发，于 2022 年被 Branch 收购。当时，Branch 承诺不会将 Nova Launcher 变为订阅式付费、带有广告的普通 Android 桌面启动器。

According to Kevin Barry, he has been continuously working towards open-sourcing Nova Launcher over the past few months. He stated that although Branch had promised during the acquisition of Nova Launcher that it would eventually be open-sourced if he left, Barry is now being asked to stop developing Nova Launcher and cease open-source efforts. 据 Kevin Barry 透露，其在过去几个月不断为 Nova Launcher 的开源进行付出。其表示，虽然 Branch 曾在收购 Nova Launcher 时承诺，其若离职，Nova Launcher 最终则会开源，但 Barry 现被要求停止开发 Nova Launcher 和终止进行开源工作。

Reports indicate that since its inception, Nova Launcher has consistently been one of Android's most popular third-party desktop launchers, owing to its ability to provide customization features such as gestures and icons that far exceed those of AOSP desktops. 据报道指出，Nova Launcher 自诞生以来，一直都是 Android 备受欢迎的第三方桌面启动器之一，因其能够提供远超 AOSP 桌面的手势、图标等自定义功能。

item.title: ASML 入股法国 AI 初创 Mistral，成为后者最大股东
item.guid: ASML-入股法国-AI-初创-Mistral，成为后者最大股东
item.description:
According to Reuters, ASML, the global semiconductor industry leader, recently announced that it has led the latest funding round for French AI startup Mistral AI, thereby becoming its largest single shareholder. 据路透社报道，全球半导体龙头企业 ASML 日前宣布，其已领投法国 AI 初创 Mistral AI 的最新一轮融资，并借此成为后者最大的单一股东。

It is reported that this funding round totals up to 1.7 billion euros (ASML will invest 1.3 billion euros). The report states that this round of financing will make Mistral AI Europe's highest-valued AI company, with a pre-Series C valuation reaching 10 billion euros. 据悉，本轮融资总额高达 17 亿欧元（ASML 将投入 13 亿欧元）。报道称，此轮融资将使 Mistral AI 成为欧洲估值最高的 AI 公司，其 C 轮投前估值达到 100 亿欧元。

The report points out that this investment marks a significant strategic shift in ASML's history, highlighting its ambition to transcend its traditional role as an equipment manufacturer. By becoming Mistral AI's largest shareholder, ASML aims to fundamentally accelerate the research and development of semiconductor technologies optimized for next-generation AI applications. 报道指出，本次投资是 ASML 历史上一次重大的战略转变，凸显了其超越传统设备制造商角色的雄心。通过成为 Mistral AI 的最大股东，ASML 旨在从根本上加速专为下一代 AI 应用而优化的半导体技术的研发。

This year, Mistral AI has released two models, "Mistral Medium 3" and "Magistral." The former claims to benchmark against Claude Sonnet 3.7 in performance, stating that it achieves or even exceeds 90% of the latter's performance. 今年，Mistral AI 已发布了「Mistral Medium 3」和「Magistral」两款模型，其中前者号称性能表现上对标 Claude Sonnet 3.7，称其达到甚至超过后者的 90% 性能。

item.title: 阿里夸克被在华留学生「围攻」：无法领取会员
item.guid: 阿里夸克被在华留学生「围攻」：无法领取会员
item.description:
Recently, some international students in China posted on the social media platform Xiaohongshu, stating that they were unable to complete authentication when using Quark's newly launched "Education Plan," thus unable to obtain relevant membership benefits. The related topic "Quark forgot us" subsequently emerged, sparking heated discussion. 近日，有在华留学生在社交媒体小红书发帖称，自己在使用夸克新上线的「教育计划」时无法完成认证，因而无法获得相关会员权益。相关话题「夸克忘了我们」也随之出现，引发热议。

It is reported that Quark launched its education plan at the end of August, allowing enrolled university students and teachers to receive free membership services for a certain period after completing identity verification, and subsequently enjoy exclusive discounts. However, some international students stated that despite also studying at Chinese universities, they were repeatedly unable to complete the authentication process after multiple attempts. 据悉，夸克在 8 月底发布了教育计划，在校大学生及教师完成身份认证后，可免费领取一定时间的会员服务，并在后续享受专属优惠。但部分留学生表示，尽管同样就读于中国高校，反复尝试后仍无法完成认证流程。

Public information shows that China has currently become the world's third-largest destination country for international students, with over 500,000 international students in China by 2025. As of press time, Quark has not yet responded to the related controversy. 公开信息显示，中国目前已成为全球第三大留学目的国，2025 年在华留学生超过 50 万人。截至发稿前，夸克方面尚未对相关争议作出回应。

item.title: 💡 吴恩达：智能体当下的最大瓶颈在于「人」
item.guid: 💡-吴恩达：智能体当下的最大瓶颈在于「人」
item.description:
Recently, Andrew Ng, Associate Professor of Computer Science at Stanford University, was interviewed on the "No Priors" podcast, where he and the host discussed the core drivers of current AI technology development, the obstacles to implementing Agentic AI, and key future industry trends. 近期，斯坦福大学计算机科学系副教授吴恩达接受《No Priors》节目采访，其在节目中与主持人共同探讨了当前 AI 技术发展的核心驱动力、智能体（Agentic AI）的实现障碍，以及未来行业变革的关键趋势。

He believes that the current "scale-first" narrative, dominated by a few top companies, has severely skewed public perception. Although there is still room for model expansion, its difficulty has become extremely immense. True breakthroughs will come from multiple dimensions — agentic workflows, multimodal innovation, practice-driven applications, and more. 他认为，当前由少数顶级公司主导的「规模至上」叙事，已严重带偏了公众认知。尽管模型扩展仍有空间，但其难度已极其巨大。真正的突破将来自多个维度 —— 智能体工作流、多模态创新、实践应用驱动等。

Andrew Ng stated that the development of AI is by no means a singular path, but rather a diversified process jointly driven by countless intelligent individuals from various directions. 吴恩达表示， AI 的发展绝非单一路径，而是由无数聪明人从不同方向共同推动的多元化进程。

Regarding agents, Andrew Ng frankly stated that the current "growth rate of marketing hype in the agent field far exceeds actual business progress." The biggest obstacle to achieving true agent applications is not technical components (such as computer control, safety guardrails), but rather the lack of talent and engineering processes. 针对智能体，吴恩达坦言当前智能体领域「营销热度的增速远超实际业务进展」。实现真正智能体应用的最大障碍，并非技术组件（如计算机控制、安全护栏），而是人才与工程化流程的缺失。

Among the current most autonomous application cases, he specifically mentioned AI programming assistants: their demonstrated multi-step planning and execution capabilities make them one of the most mature and economically valuable agents today. 在当前最具自主性的应用案例中，他特别提到了 AI 编程助手：其展现出的多步骤规划与执行能力，使其成为当前最成熟、最具经济价值的智能体之一。

It's worth noting that Andrew Ng put forward a sharp point: "It now appears that too many ways of working in 2022 will be completely obsolete by 2025." 值得一提的是，吴恩达提出一个尖锐的观点： 「现在看来，太多 2022 年的工作方式在 2025 年已经完全失效。」

He predicts that the most shocking and largely unacknowledged development in the next five years will be the boost in capabilities gained by individuals who embrace AI. Whether for professional work or personal matters, those who make good use of AI will gain "superpowers beyond imagination". 他预测， 未来五年最令人震撼、且多数人尚未意识到的，将是拥抱 AI 的个体所获得的能力提升。 无论是专业工作还是个人事务，善用 AI 的人将获得「超乎想象的超能力」。

item.title: 魅族 22 正式官宣
item.guid: 魅族-22-正式官宣
item.description:
On September 8th, Meizu Technology officially announced that it will officially release its new Meizu 22 phone on September 15th. 9 月 8 日，魅族科技正式宣布，将于 9 月 15 日正式发布旗下魅族 22 新机。

The Meizu 22 has a body size of 6.3 inches, features a square rear camera module in the upper left corner, a 2.5D micro-arc front cover, and a 3D equally deep four-curved back cover (with a floating design); the body weighs 190g, is 8.15mm thick, and boasts a 50:50 balanced design. 魅族 22 机身尺寸为 6.3 英寸，采用左上角方形后置摄像头模组，采用 2.5D 微弧正面盖板以及 3D 等深四曲面后盖（并采用悬浮式设计）；机身重量为 190g，厚度为 8.15mm，拥有 50:50 平衡设计。

Regarding the screen, the Meizu 22 will feature a globally unique 0.8mm four-equal-side (referring to the white border area) white panel, utilizing Meizu's self-developed LIPO ultra-narrow bezel technology (actual bezel is 1.2mm). 屏幕方面， 魅族 22 将采用全球独有的 0.8mm 四等边（指白边区域）白面板，采用了魅族自研 LIPO 超窄边框技术（实际边框为 1.2mm）。

In terms of imaging performance, the Meizu 22 will be equipped with a 50-megapixel triple rear camera setup, with the main camera using a full-blooded OV50H sensor; the 3x periscope telephoto will use an IMX882 sensor, supporting 15cm telephoto macro; and the ultra-wide angle will use an OV50D sensor. 影像表现上，魅族 22 将配备后置 5000 万像素三摄，主摄采用 OV50H 满血版传感器；潜望 3 倍长焦为 IMX882 传感器，支持 15cm 长焦微距；超广角则采用 OV50D 传感器。

In other aspects, the Meizu 22 is equipped with Qualcomm's fourth-generation Snapdragon 8s processor and provides a 4500mm² VC liquid cooling system. 其他方面，魅族 22 配备高通第四代骁龙 8s 处理器，提供 4500mm² 的 VC 液冷散热系统。

Additionally, Wan Zhiqiang, CMO of Xingji Meizu Group China, stated on Weibo that the Meizu 22 will go on sale on the day of the launch event, and most stores will have it available for experience on the 15th. 此外，星纪魅族集团中国区CMO万志强在微博表示，魅族 22 将于发布会当天开售，大部分店面 15 号可到货体验。

item.title: 小米 AI 眼镜上线支付宝「看一下支付」
item.guid: 小米-AI-眼镜上线支付宝「看一下支付」
item.description:
Recently, netizens have successively posted that Xiaomi AI Glasses have released the official firmware update 1.2.31.0. The updated features include the Alipay "Look and Pay" mentioned at the launch event, which supports users to wake up Xiao Ai to assist with QR code payment, conveniently completing transactions. 日前，有网友陆续发帖称，小米 AI 眼镜发布 1.2.31.0 正式版固件更新，此次更新的功能包括发布会上提到的支付宝「看一下支付」，支持用户唤醒小爱协助扫码支付，便捷完成付款。

It is reported that the payment function of Xiaomi AI Glasses was jointly developed by Xiaomi and Alipay, and combines Alipay's multi-dimensional risk control system to ensure the security of every transaction, allowing users to complete payments in 3 simple steps through the glasses when their hands are busy or it's inconvenient to use a phone. 据悉，小米 AI 眼镜的支付功能由小米联合支付宝打造，并结合支付宝的多维度风控系统确保每一笔交易的安全性，方便用户在双手忙碌或不便使用手机时，通过眼镜简单 3 步即可完成支付。

With the official launch of the "Look and Pay" function on Xiaomi AI Glasses, Alipay has become a standard feature for smart glasses. In addition to Xiaomi, mainstream domestic smart glasses manufacturers such as Rokid, Quark, and RayNeo Innovation have all deployed and launched this feature. 随着小米 AI 眼镜正式上线「看一下支付」功能，支付宝已经成为智能眼镜标配，除小米外，Rokid、夸克、雷鸟创新等国内主流智能眼镜厂商均已布局上线。

Analysts believe that payment is expected to become the first true "killer app" for AI glasses, allowing the industry to see the potential for AI glasses to become the next generation of personal computing terminals in the AI era. 分析人士认为，支付有望成为 AI 眼镜真正意义上的第一个「杀手级」应用，让行业看到 AI 眼镜具有在 AI 时代成为下一代个人计算终端的潜力。

item.title: OPPO Find X9 系列将标配「升级版」丹霞原彩镜头
item.guid: OPPO-Find-X9-系列将标配「升级版」丹霞原彩镜头
item.description:
On September 8th, Zhou Yibao, product manager for the OPPO Find series, posted on Weibo that the upcoming Find X9 series will fully feature the upgraded "Danxia Original Color Lens". 9 月 8 日，OPPO Find 系列产品负责人周意保在微博发文表示即将发布的 Find X9 系列将全系搭载升级版「丹霞原彩镜头」。

Zhou Yibao also stated that the Find X9 series will achieve "three-hardware collaborative work," meaning the "imaging lens" + "global multispectral sensor" + "Danxia color restoration lens" will work together to achieve better color reproduction in different scenarios and modes. 周意保还表示，本次 Find X9 系列将实现「三硬件协同工作」，即「成像镜头」+「全局多光谱传感器」+「丹霞色彩还原镜头」协同运作，在不同场景、不同模式下均能实现更好的色彩还原。

The Danxia Original Color Lens first debuted at the launch event of the "New Find X8 Series" on April 10, 2025, and was featured in the Find X8 Ultra. It aims to solve the problem of mobile imaging systems restoring human skin tones in complex lighting scenarios. The official statement indicates that this iteration will introduce "the industry's most advanced fourth-generation solution". 丹霞原彩镜头首次亮相于 2025 年 4 月 10 日「全新 Find X8 系列」的发布会上并搭载于 Find X8 Ultra 中，意在解决复杂光照场景下手机影像系统对人物肤色的还原问题，官方表示本次迭代将推出「目前行业最先进的第四代解决方案」。

item.title: 即梦图片 4.0 模型上线，支持多模态生图
item.guid: 即梦图片-4.0-模型上线，支持多模态生图
item.description:
On September 5th, Jiemeng AI announced an update and launched the Jiemeng Image 4.0 model. 9 月 5 日，即梦 AI 宣布更新，并推出即梦图片 4.0 模型。

According to the official introduction, Jiemeng Image 4.0 supports multimodal image generation for the first time, with the following highlights: 官方介绍，即梦图片 4.0 首次支持了多模态生图，拥有以下亮点：

    Precise Instruction Editing: Simply describe your needs in plain language to accurately achieve editing effects such as adding, deleting, modifying, replacing, and referencing, enabling multi-scenario applications and gameplay for commercial design, artistic creation, and entertainment;

    High Feature Retention: Character Retention: Character features can be highly restored even across different creative forms (illustration/3D/photography), keeping creation consistently controllable; Image Retention: Maximally preserves original image details, eliminating concerns about "AI greasiness" after editing, achieving lossless editing;

    Deep Intent Understanding: Upgraded knowledge base, supports idea formation, possesses reasoning and prediction capabilities, and offers adaptive aspect ratios;

    Multi-image input and output: input multiple images at once, supporting complex editing such as combination, migration, replacement, and derivation, and featuring content association;

    Ultra-high speed and ultra-high definition: text-to-image direct output at 2K takes less than 1.8 seconds, and supports up to 4K resolution generation.

Currently, Jiemeng Image 4.0 will gradually be rolled out to all users. 目前，即梦图片 4.0 将陆续覆盖全部用户。

item.title: AI 浏览器 Fellou 宣布升级
item.guid: AI-浏览器-Fellou-宣布升级
item.description:
Recently, AI browser Fellou announced the launch of its CE version, aiming to enable everyone to simplify complex tasks and transform abstract ideas into concrete results with unprecedented efficiency and freedom. 日前，AI 浏览器 Fellou 宣布推出 CE 版本，旨在让每个人都能以前所未有的效率和自由度，将复杂的任务化繁为简，将抽象的创意变为具体的成果。

In Fellou CE, users can experience the following: 在 Fellou CE 中，用户能够体验到以下内容：

    Continuous Interaction: Whether giving instructions through natural language, Fellou will automatically understand and adapt to the user's intent.

    Continuous Tasks: Fellou CE is dedicated to achieving goal-oriented automated workflows — users only need to propose high-level goals, and Fellou CE can autonomously break down and execute all sub-tasks. It also supports autonomous execution across applications.

    Continuous Memory: Fellou CE has created a unified memory layer that dynamically links all user interaction history, knowledge snippets, personal preferences, and fragmented information, forming a traceable and evolving "digital mind map."

    Multimodal Conversion: Fellou CE breaks down modality barriers, allowing users' creativity to seamlessly switch between text, images, code, 3D models, and audio.

    At the same time, two core practical features in the Fellou CE version — Deep Search and Visual Report Generation — are both freely available.

Fellou AI stated that Fellou chose the AI browser as its product form not just to integrate AI capabilities, but to redefine the way humans and AI collaborate. "Fellou is no longer just an information portal, but your intelligent assistant in the digital world." Fellou AI 表示，Fellou 选择以 AI 浏览器为产品形态，不只是为了整合 AI 能力，更是为了重新定义人类与 AI 协作方式。「Fellou 不再只是一个信息入口，而是你在数字世界中的智能助手。」

In the Halluminate’s Web Bench benchmark, Fellou CE's performance results surpassed Manus and OpenAI. 在基准测试 Halluminate’s Web Bench benchmark 中，Fellou CE 表现结果超越 Manus 和 OpenAI。

item.title: Vidu Q1 参考生图多项能力对标 Nano Banana
item.guid: Vidu-Q1-参考生图多项能力对标-Nano-Banana
item.description:
On September 9th, just 10 days after Google released Nano Banana, Shengshu Technology's video large model Vidu officially launched its Q1 reference image generation feature. 9 月 9 日，在 Google 发布 Nano Banana 仅 10 天后，生数科技旗下视频大模型 Vidu 正式推出 Q1 参考生图功能。

According to the official introduction, Vidu Q1 breaks the domestic generation limit by supporting 7 reference image inputs, and comprehensively surpasses Flux.1 Kontext in key indicators such as consistency and fidelity, directly competing with Nano Banana. 官方介绍，Vidu Q1 以支持 7 张参考图输入打破国内生成上限，并在一致性、还原度等关键指标上全面超越 Flux.1 Kontext，正面对标 Nano Banana。

The Q1 reference image generation released by Vidu this time has five major highlights: 此次 Vidu 发布的 Q1 参考生图主要有五大亮点：

    Industry-leading number of references: simultaneously supports 7 reference image inputs, offering strong controllability;

    Stronger subject consistency: ensures that the appearance and characteristics of characters/subjects do not deviate even with multiple people, multiple scenes, and multiple generations;

    High fidelity and stronger realism: while retaining the characteristics of the reference image, it offers high fidelity, closer to the user's original input, truly achieving "what you see is what you get";

    Extremely high creative freedom: one image + one prompt allows for free costume changes, background changes, and free synthesis; supports multiple people in the same scene, meeting scenarios such as complex plots, group photos, and multi-character e-commerce;

    Supports 1080P high-definition resolution and stronger Chinese semantic understanding.

In specific tests, from the perspective of third-party evaluation agencies, Vidu surpassed Nano Banana and Kontext in the consistency index of AI-generated images, ranking first; in the comprehensive index scores for consistency, authenticity, clarity, aesthetics, and semantic understanding, it ranked second, only behind Nano Banana. 具体测试中，从第三方评测机构来看，Vidu 在 AI 参考生图的一致性指标上超过了 Nano Banana 和 Kontext ，位居第一；在一致性、真实性、清晰度、美学、语义理解等综合指标评分中位居第二，仅次于 Nano Banana。

item.title: 影石 Ace Pro 2 推出冰川白限量版
item.guid: 影石-Ace-Pro-2-推出冰川白限量版
item.description:

According to the official introduction, the white body has been refreshed, bringing a new experience to action cameras with a stylish, simple, fresh, and vibrant appearance. The new color scheme continues the powerful performance of the Ace Pro 2, equipped with a new generation 1/1.3-inch 8K sensor and an AI dual-chip system, demonstrating excellent performance in image quality, night scenes, and portrait photography. 官方介绍，白色机身焕然一新，以时尚简洁、清新活力的外观带来运动相机的全新体验。新配色延续了Ace Pro 2的强大性能，搭载新一代 1/1.3 英寸 8K 传感器与 AI 双芯系统，在画质、夜景、人像表现等方面均有出色表现。

At the same time, Insta360 has also launched a series of new accessories for the Ace Pro 2, including a screen hood, black mist filter, and mini extended battery handle, aiming to unlock more creative possibilities for the Ace Pro 2. 同时，影石针对 Ace Pro 2 还推出了一系列新配件，包括屏幕遮光罩、黑柔镜、迷你续航手柄等，旨在为 Ace Pro 2 解锁更多创意可能。

In addition, the upcoming firmware update will support Wi-Fi live streaming, allowing direct connection to mainstream live streaming platforms like Douyin for one-click broadcasting. 此外，在即将更新的固件版本中，还将支持 Wi-Fi 直播，可直连主流直播软件抖音，实现一键开播。

Regarding pricing, the Insta360 Ace Pro 2 Glacier White Limited Edition, paired with the Street Photography Kit (Starlight Silver), is priced at 2998 yuan. 价格方面，影石 Insta360 Ace Pro 2 冰川白限量版搭配街拍套餐（星辉银）售价为 2998 元。

item.title: 16.38 万元起，领克 10 EM-P 上市
item.guid: 16.38-万元起，领克-10-EM-P-上市
item.description:
Yesterday, the "Intelligent Electric Hybrid Four-Wheel Drive Sedan" Lynk & Co 10 EM-P was officially launched, with a limited-time promotional price starting from 163,800 yuan, offering four variants: 120 AWD Halo, 120 AWD Ultra, 240 AWD Ultra, and 240 AWD Ultra Sport Edition. 昨日，「智能电混四驱轿车」领克 10 EM-P 正式上市， 限时优惠价 16.38 万元起，共推出 120 四驱 Halo、120 四驱 Ultra、240 四驱 Ultra、240 四驱 Ultra 运动版四个版型。

As Lynk & Co's first mid-to-large plug-in hybrid sedan, the Lynk & Co 10 EM-P not only boasts a distinctive Lynk & Co original exterior and luxurious quality for all occupants, but also comes standard with an intelligent electric four-wheel drive system and lidar. It is the first sedan to be equipped with the NVIDIA Thor assisted driving chip, supporting the Qianli Haohan assisted driving H7 solution, and featuring the LYNK Flyme Auto 2 intelligent cockpit system. 作为领克首款中大型插电式混合动力轿车，领克 10 EM-P 不仅拥有一眼领克的原创外观、全员舒享的豪华品质，而且全系标配智电四驱系统和激光雷达，在轿车中率先搭载英伟达 Thor 辅助驾驶芯片，支持千里浩瀚辅助驾驶 H7 方案，搭载 LYNK Flyme Auto 2 智能座舱系统。

Specifically, the Lynk & Co 10 EM-P adopts a new 1.5T Evo electric hybrid dedicated engine with an ultra-high thermal efficiency of 47.26% + DHT Evo hybrid electric drive. It achieves a maximum power of 390kW and a maximum torque of 755N·m, with a 0-100km/h acceleration time as fast as 5.1 seconds, and a minimum fuel consumption of only 4.2L/100km in CLTC conditions with low battery. 具体来看，领克 10 EM-P 采用 47.26% 超高热效率的 1.5T Evo 全新电混专用引擎 + DHT Evo 混动电驱，最大功率达到 390kW，最大扭矩 755N·m，0-100km/h 加速时间最快 5.1 秒，CLTC 工况亏电油耗最低仅 4.2L/100km。

Relying on the CMA Evo mid-to-large vehicle platform, the Lynk & Co 10 EM-P has also undergone comprehensive chassis optimization, featuring a pure aluminum alloy double-wishbone front suspension + enhanced five-link independent rear suspension, combined with hydraulic variable damping suspension technology. After professional track-level, all-scenario tuning by Lynk & Co, the Lynk & Co 10 EM-P achieved a moose test result of 83.2km/h. 依托 CMA Evo 中大型车平台，领克 10 EM-P 还对底盘进行了全面优化，纯铝合金双叉臂前悬架 + 增强版五连杆独立后悬架，配合液压可变阻尼悬架技术，经由领克赛道级全场景专业调校，领克 10 EM-P 麋鹿测试成绩 83.2km/h。

Furthermore, the Lynk & Co 10 EM-P successfully passed multiple tests including charging system safety capability, low-voltage electrical system performance, lightning strike extreme electromagnetic environment, and battery safety warning, successfully achieving China's first "Grand Slam" of electrified battery safety certifications. 此外，领克 10 EM-P 还顺利通过了充电系统安全能力、低压电气系统性能、雷击极端电磁环境、电池安全预警等多项测试，成功拿下中国首个电池安全认证的带电「大满贯」。

item.title: 我国拟修订国家通用语言文字法，规范网络空间用语用字
item.guid: 我国拟修订国家通用语言文字法，规范网络空间用语用字
item.description:
According to Xinhua News Agency, the revised draft of the National Common Language and Characters Law was submitted for its first review to the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress on September 8. 据新华网报道，国家通用语言文字法修订草案 9 月 8 日首次提请全国人大常委会会议审议。

This revised draft, consisting of five chapters and 32 articles, adds regulatory requirements for language and characters used in cyberspace, clarifying that the national common language and characters used on internet information platforms hosted by the government or providing public social services should comply with national norms and standards. 这个五章 32 条的修订草案，增加了对网络空间用语用字的规范要求，明确政府主办的或者提供社会公共服务的互联网信息平台中使用的国家通用语言文字应当符合国家的规范和标准。

The report points out that the national common language and characters are formed on the basis of communication, exchange, and integration among various ethnic groups. They are fundamental elements of Chinese culture, a distinct symbol of the Chinese nation, and, like the national flag, national anthem, and national emblem, an important symbol of the country. The revised draft clarifies: 报道指出，国家通用语言文字是在各民族交往交流交融的基础上形成的，是中华文化的基础要素、中华民族的鲜明标识，和国旗、国歌、国徽一样，是国家的重要象征。修订草案明确：

    Network literary and artistic programs, web dramas, web movies, and other online audio-visual programs, as well as the names, packaging, and descriptions of goods sold within the country, should primarily use the national common language and characters;

    International exhibitions, international conferences, and other events held within the country that genuinely require the use of foreign languages and characters should simultaneously use the national common language and characters;

    The third week of September each year is designated as the National Common Language and Characters Promotion and Popularization Week; international Chinese education should teach the national common language and characters.

It is reported that since the implementation of the current National Common Language and Characters Law in 2001, the national Mandarin popularization rate has exceeded 80%, the proportion of literate people using standardized Chinese characters has exceeded 95%, and the illiteracy rate has dropped to 2.67%. 据悉，现行国家通用语言文字法 2001 年实施以来，全国普通话普及率已超过 80%，识字人口使用规范汉字的比例超过 95%，文盲率下降至 2.67%。

item.title: 迅雷新增第三方网盘下载：支持百度网盘
item.guid: 迅雷新增第三方网盘下载：支持百度网盘
item.description:
Recently, a new version of Xunlei was officially launched, with the official statement indicating that this update focuses on the core pain points of users acquiring resources: 日前，迅雷新版本正式上线，官方表示本次更新聚焦用户资源获取的核心痛点：

Added third-party cloud drive download function: This function is open to all users for free, aiming to simplify the cumbersome process of "switching multiple cloud drives and repeated logins" through functional iteration, further enhancing the convenience and efficiency of the download experience.

Specifically, after users complete third-party cloud drive authorization, they can directly view and download all resources within the Xunlei client; it also supports original quality cloud playback for mainstream video formats like MP4, MKV, and MOV, without needing to jump to other players. 具体来看，用户完成第三方网盘授权后，即可在迅雷客户端内直接查看、下载所有资源；更支持 MP4、MKV、MOV 等主流视频格式的原画云播，无需跳转其他播放器。

To adapt to different users' storage habits and usage scenarios, this version of Xunlei provides two ways to add cloud drives: 为适配不同用户的存储习惯与使用场景，迅雷本次版本提供了两种添加网盘的方式：

    Direct connection to mainstream cloud drives: Through the cloud drive open platform, popular common platforms such as Baidu Netdisk and Alibaba Cloud Drive can be directly added.

    WebDav protocol mounting: Supports cloud drive access based on the WebDav universal network protocol.

item.title: 鸿蒙版《原神》将于 10 号上线
item.guid: 鸿蒙版《原神》将于-10-号上线
item.description:
Recently, it was officially announced that the HarmonyOS version of "Genshin Impact" will be officially launched on September 10th. 近日，《原神》鸿蒙版正式宣布将于 9 月 10 日正式上线。

It is reported that this update is "Genshin Impact" version 6.0 "Moon One," and adds the Nordkalen region, located at the southern end of Snezhnaya and bordering Natlan. It is understood that the Nordkalen landscape integrates Nordic style features, and its cultural setting has no real-world prototype, aiming to create a narrative stage with "people" as the theme. 据悉，本次推送的为《原神》6.0 版本「月之一」，并新增挪德卡莱地区，位于至冬国南端与纳塔交界。据悉，挪德卡莱地貌融合北欧风格特征，人文设定无现实原型，旨在打造以「人」为主题的叙事舞台。

In August, "Genshin Impact" announced that pre-orders for its HarmonyOS version had officially opened in Huawei Game Center. According to our actual observations, the number of pre-orders has now exceeded 40,000. 8 月，《原神》宣布其鸿蒙版本预约已在华为游戏中心正式开启。据我们实际观察发现，目前预约人数已超 4 万人。

item.title: 方程豹与瑞幸达成战略合作，可在车机上点咖啡
item.guid: 方程豹与瑞幸达成战略合作，可在车机上点咖啡
item.description:
Recently, Fangchengbao Auto, a brand under BYD, announced a strategic cooperation with Luckin Coffee, enabling the Titanium 7 model to order coffee from its in-car system. 日前，比亚迪旗下方程豹汽车宣布与瑞幸咖啡达成战略合作，钛 7 车型可实现车机点咖啡。

According to the official introduction, this cooperation is based on the voice ordering function of Fangchengbao's latest technology large-space SUV Titanium 7, with Luckin Coffee being among the first brands to be listed for voice ordering. 据官方介绍，此次合作基于方程豹最新科技大空间 SUV 钛 7 的语音点单功能，瑞幸作为首批入驻品牌已上线语音点单列表。

With the above capabilities, users can place an order by simply issuing the voice command "Hello Xiaofang, help me order a Luckin Coffee," and can also select flavors by voice and automatically navigate to the store for pickup. 通过上述能力，用户只需发出语音指令「你好小方，帮我点一杯瑞幸咖啡」即可点单，还可语音进行口味选择并自动导航到店取餐。

In addition, Xiong Tianbo, General Manager of BYD Fangchengbao, previously announced that the Fangchengbao Titanium 7 will be officially launched tonight (September 9). 另外， 比亚迪方程豹总经理熊甜波此前宣布， 方程豹钛 7 将在今晚（9 月 9 日）正式上市。

item.title: OpenAI 首部 AI 电影曝光
item.guid: OpenAI-首部-AI-电影曝光
item.description:
Yesterday, The Wall Street Journal reported that OpenAI is providing tools and computing power support for an animated feature film titled "Critterz," which is expected to premiere at the Cannes Film Festival next May. 昨日，据华尔街日报报道，OpenAI 正在为一部名为《Critterz》的动画长片提供工具和算力支持，预计将在明年 5 月的戛纳电影节上首映。

"Critterz" tells the story of a group of small forest creatures embarking on an adventure after strangers disturb their village. Chad Nelson, a creative expert at OpenAI, began designing the prototypes of these characters three years ago when he was trying to make short films using the newly launched DALL-E image generation tool. Nelson is currently collaborating with production companies in London and Los Angeles. 《Critterz》讲的是一群森林小生物在陌生人打扰村庄后踏上冒险的故事。OpenAI 的创意专家 Chad Nelson 三年前在尝试用刚推出的 DALL-E 图像生成工具制作短片时，就已开始设计这些角色的雏形。目前 Nelson 正与伦敦和洛杉矶的制片公司展开合作。

James Richardson, co-founder of London-based Vertigo Films, stated that the entire film is planned to be completed in about 9 months, whereas traditional animated films typically require a 3-year production cycle. The budget is also controlled within 30 million US dollars, significantly lower than the production costs of traditional animated films. 伦敦 Vertigo Films 联合创始人 James Richardson 表示， 整部电影计划在约 9 个月内完成，而传统动画电影通常需要 3 年制作周期。同时预算控制在 3000 万美元以内，远低于传统动画电影的制作成本。

For production, Vertigo Films will collaborate with Native Foreign studio, which specializes in integrating AI with traditional filmmaking. Nelson and Native Foreign co-founder Kleverov had actually produced a short film version of "Critterz" as early as 2023, and later OpenAI directly recruited Nelson to be the liaison for creators and artists using AI tools. 制作方面，Vertigo Films 将与专门从事 AI 与传统影像融合的 Native Foreign 工作室联合完成。Nelson 和 Native Foreign 联合创始人 Kleverov 其实早在 2023 年就制作过《Critterz》的短片版本，后来 OpenAI 直接把 Nelson 招进来，让他做创作者和艺术家使用 AI 工具的联络人。

The team will invite live actors for voiceovers, hire artists to draw concept sketches, and then input these human-created materials into various OpenAI tools for AI processing. The film's script is being completed by some members of the writing team who participated in the creation of "Paddington 3: Paddington in Peru," and it has now entered the formal production stage, with the voice actor list to be finalized in the coming weeks. 团队将邀请真人演员进行配音，聘请艺术家绘制概念草图，然后将这些人工创作的素材输入 OpenAI 的各项工具进行 AI 化处理。 影片剧本则由曾参与《帕丁顿熊 3：秘鲁大冒险》创作的编剧团队部分成员完成，目前已进入正式制作阶段，配音演员名单也将在未来几周内确定。

According to Kleverov, while AI-generated content itself cannot be copyrighted, the film's hybrid form, where human-created voiceovers and artworks are input into AI tools, is likely to meet the conditions for copyright protection. 据 Kleverov 透露，虽然 AI 生成的内容本身无法获得版权，但影片中由人类创作的配音和艺术作品输入 AI 工具，这种混合形式很可能符合版权保护条件。

Nelson frankly stated that OpenAI hopes to prove through the success of "Critterz" that AI technology can support the production of theatrical-grade works, promote the broader adoption of AI technology in Hollywood, and simultaneously lower the barrier to content creation. Nelson 坦言，OpenAI 希望通过《Critterz》的成功证明 AI 技术能够支撑院线级作品制作，推动好莱坞更广泛地采用 AI 技术，同时降低内容创作门槛。

item.title: 《利刃出鞘 3》多伦多电影节首映
item.guid: 《利刃出鞘-3》多伦多电影节首映
item.description:
On September 7th, the third day of the 2025 Toronto International Film Festival (TIFF), director Rian Johnson unveiled the latest installment in the "Knives Out" series, "Knives Out 3," and grandly announced, "We're going back to the church." 9 月 7 日，在 2025 年多伦多国际电影节（TIFF）第三天，导演 Rian Johnson 带来了《利刃出鞘》系列最新作《利刃出鞘3》的首次亮相，并高调宣布「我们要回到教堂了」。

It is reported that this new work returns to a Gothic mystery style, inspired by Edgar Allan Poe, with a darker and more spiritual atmosphere, but still retaining the series' characteristic humor and twists. 据悉，这部新作回归哥特式推理风格，灵感源自 Edgar Allan Poe，氛围更黑暗、灵性更强，但依旧保留系列一贯的幽默与反转。

This film once again stars Daniel Craig as Detective Benoit Blanc, investigating a bizarre murder case in a small New York town's church community. He teams up with a young priest (Josh O’Connor) and a sheriff (Mila Kunis) to solve the case, which is so complex it's called 'impossible,' but this also builds a series of breathtaking plot climaxes. 本片由 Daniel Craig 再度饰演侦探 Benoit Blanc，调查一起发生在纽约小镇教堂社区的离奇谋杀案。他与年轻神父（Josh O’Connor）和警长（Mila Kunis）联手破案，案件复杂到被称为「不可能」，但也因此构建出一连串令人屏息的剧情高潮。

It's worth noting that despite its more serious tone, 'Knives Out 3' might be the funniest installment in the series. The film will be released in select US theaters on November 26 and will be available on Netflix on December 12. 值得一提的是，尽管基调更严肃，《利刃出鞘 3》可能是系列中最搞笑的一部。影片将于 11 月 26 日登陆美国部分影院，12 月 12 日上线 Netflix。

item.title: 《志愿军：浴血和平》定档 9 月 30 日上映
item.guid: 《志愿军：浴血和平》定档-9-月-30-日上映
item.description:
According to Xinhua News Agency, the film 'The Volunteers: Blood and Peace,' directed by Chen Kaige, has officially announced its release date for September 30, along with a release date poster. 据新华网消息，由陈凯歌执导的电影《志愿军：浴血和平》官宣定档 9 月 30 日上映，并释出定档海报。

The film focuses on the 'fight while negotiating' combat process from the Fifth Phase Offensive of the Korean War until the signing of the armistice agreement, not only showcasing the bloody battles on the front lines but also emphasizing the diplomatic struggles at the negotiation table. 影片聚焦抗美援朝战争第五次战役后直至签署停战协议期间「边打边谈」的作战历程，不仅展现前线战场的浴血拼杀，还将着力讲述谈判桌上的外交较量。

The film also simultaneously announced its cast, which, in addition to familiar faces like Zhang Zifeng and Zhu Yawen who appeared in the first two parts, also includes powerful actors like Song Jia, Peng Yuchang, and Guo Tao joining the battle with new roles. 影片同步官宣阵容，除张子枫、朱亚文等贯穿前两部的熟悉面孔外，更有宋佳、彭昱畅、郭涛等实力影人携新角色加入战局。
